title: Len Saldua
author: Len Saldua
content: Perhaps someone can enlighten me about this... Richard Heart talks about "delayed gratification" where people buying into the project are "rewarded" for not selling and "punished" for selling too soon... yet projects like SAFUU and Sphere seem to offer a similar deal in that the sooner you sell, the more the 20 % Tax will affect you. Both Sphere and SAFUU are perfectly capable of matching whatever gains HEX is offering... be it 2X or 10X or whatever... you just gonna hold on to them long enough for the token to enter a bull run. During a bear market ? Much harder, and perhaps impossible because altcoin prices are always going down. By the way, I am invested in both of these ( 1K and 2K in each at current prices ) and I can tell you I have not made any money while everything is crashing. So even if I stay for 6 more months, quite likely I may not even break even after taxes with either of them. But give me a bull rally, even one lasting for only one month, and the picture changes completely. What I see with HEX is ( from what I can guess ) that you have to "lock up" your investment for years, so that is where I see the difference. I only need a 1 month rally for me to make money with SAFUU or SPHERE, not 3 to 6 years.

comments.author: RussiaUkraineTranslation
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on May 12, 2022, 01:09:03 PMPerhaps someone can enlighten me about this... Richard Heart talks about "delayed gratification" where people buying into the project are "rewarded" for not selling and "punished" for selling too soon... yet projects like SAFUU and Sphere seem to offer a similar deal in that the sooner you sell, the more the 20 % Tax will affect you. During a bear market ? Much harder, and perhaps impossible because altcoin prices are always going down. By the way, I am invested in both of these ( 1K and 2K in each at current prices ) and I can tell you I have not made any money while everything is crashing. So even if I stay for 6 more months, quite likely I may not even break even after taxes with either of them. But give me a bull rally, even one lasting for only one month, and the picture changes completely. What I see with HEX is ( from what I can guess ) that you have to "lock up" your investment for years, so that is where I see the difference. I only need a 1 month rally for me to make money with SAFUU or SPHERE, not 3 to 6 years.I haven't heard of SAFUU or Sphere but I did hear about MAXX, which is giving away yield boosting NFTs right now. I think the major difference between tokenized CD platforms is how they generate staking rewards. Simpler protocols just pay rewards based on inflation and withdrawal fees. More advanced contracts, like the MAXX Finance one, generate revenue from a suite of DApps, token transaction taxes, and multiple validator node rewards.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: One investment is brighter than the other  Perfect investment at the time of crypto market extinction, when all half-dead altcoins drop in price to 99%. SAFUU does not even have clear data about its capitalization and circulation, it is not traded anywhere except PancakeSwap. SPHERE is also a completely illiquid coin that trades somewhere on the little-known DEX MM Finance, in a little-popular WCRO/SPHERE trading pair that has trading volume under $3,500. It's hard for me to speculate on what exactly is good about these projects.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: Morningstarr on July 18, 2022, 06:25:25 PMI don't have  SAFUU tokens, but I have Sphere tokens that I got from the bounty. Hope your prediction will be right about these tokens. I will hodl them until it reach 5$ per sphere token.Keep dreaming about that. The performance of hex can't be copied by another crypto like safuu and sphere finance. Safuu was a scam token and i think that if sphere has zero probability to worth even one dollar. Is not it better if you are selling your shit token and then convert it into the legit token? this will be far better than holding your money into the shit token form that doesn't have any potential to increase anymore. We know that how safuu was going down so hard in a short time and community has proven that was a scam token.i think that if sphere will have the same faith like safuu which will be going down too. The apy was actually a non sense thing that being offered by both

When I checked, only 0.024% of Sphere tokens were burned in several weeks through over 3,000 transactions. And the last transaction was three days ago, it seems that this experiment will also fail.https://sphere.wiki/bbb

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: Quote from: Morningstarr on July 18, 2022, 06:25:25 PMI don't have  SAFUU tokens, but I have Sphere tokens that I got from the bounty. Hope your prediction will be right about these tokens. I will hodl them until it reach 5$ per sphere token.These two coins Hex and Saffu are very much popular where sphere is just entering the market. Two years ago during the last bull market that Hex pumped to its all-time high. which went to 50 cents, killing the first two 0. In bearish market all cryptocurrencies have lost their value massively. But in the next two years, Hex will move to a unique place. Safu, on the other hand got the attention of their APY. It can be said that they haven't had a long bull market which has caused them to come down with a bearish streak. However, it is in the best position among all the projects that currently offer more APY. Sphere Finance has not received much recognition. Hope their position will be strong in the bull market.

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: Staking is a great way to make money. Whether it is in DeFi like SPELL and Swapr or supporting a network with POS like FTM and CNDL.

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: SAFUU token Almost dead now. this token price was $200+ but now price is $13. Its price has fallen very rapidly and is constantly falling. I think after some weeks or months its value will be zero. HEX token something good. and it can do more better in the future but i am not petty sure. but i seen hex project team very strong and active.
